metadata.Title: CVE-2017-17566 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Xen through 4.9.x allowing PV guest OS users to cause a denial of service (host OS crash) or gain host OS privileges in shadow mode by mapping a certain auxiliary page.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> hypervisor packages are in universe. For issues in the hypervisor, add appropriate tags to each section, ex: Tags_xen: universe-binary

criterions.comment: xen package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.9.2-0ubuntu1').
